info.author: Jochen Kupperschmidt
info.description:
This module provides an (almost) complete wrapper around the Basecamp API. It is
written in Python and based upon the excellent ElementTree package. Requests
will be made as XML, not YAML. Responses will be XML, too.

Also works with free Basecamp (http://www.basecamphq.com/) accounts.
info.name: BasecampWrapper
info.summary: A wrapper around the Basecamp API.
info.html_description:
This module provides an (almost) complete wrapper around the Basecamp API. It is written in Python and based upon the excellent ElementTree package. Requests will be made as XML, not YAML. Responses will be XML, too.

Also works with free Basecamp (http://www.basecamphq.com/) accounts.
